quest.name: Shop till the Warrior of Light Drops
journal: This Mol maiden cannot wait to go shopping in Reunion.
objectives: Deliver the herbs, shears, and seeds to the Mol maiden.

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Could I ask you to accompany me while I go shopping?

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: The udgan told me I am to go shopping with an adventurer today. Meet me in Reunion if you have the time.

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Thank you for joining me! I just managed to buy a sack of herbs for a great price.

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Though I am not sure if I'm capable of taking them all the way back to Mol Iloh...

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Do you think you would be able to carry them for me? I am going to go and look at that stall over there. Thank you!

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Oh, I just found the loveliest pair of sheep shears.

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Could you manage to carry them as well? I have heard one of the stalls here is going to be running a special sale soon. I need to hurry and find out which!

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: I am so lucky you are here with me today. I never could have dreamed I would be able to buy so many seeds for such a low price!

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Though it seems I sprained my ankle running around searching for the sale just now. Could you be a darling and carry my shopping back home for me? Oh, thank you. You are too kind!

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: My ankle feels fine nowâ”€it is a miracle! Would you happen to have my purchases?

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Doubtless it was a heavy load, but I bet it felt like nothing for a strong adventurer such as yourself.

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Let me tell you, it was not easy getting my hands on those seeds. They taste incredible when cooked and can also be turned into oil. I had to make full use of my elbows just to avoid missing out.

dialogue.name: ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773
dialogue.text: Of course, it would not have been possible without your help. Here is a reward for all your hard work!
